payment.verify_payment_desc: Please attach the transfer receipt. The image of the transfer receipt should not have anything obstructing the QR code. If your transfer receipt does not have a QR code, we will verify your payment within 6 hours.

payment_successful.title: We have received your information
payment_successful.desc: Thank you for notifying us of your payment. We will investigate quickly within 6 hours.
